msgTemplates.firstAutomatedMsg: Hi <fn>, I saw that your <pt> was delivered. How are you enjoying it so far?
msgTemplates.positiveRes: Great, can you describe what you love most about <pt>
msgTemplates.negativeRes: I'm sorry to hear that, what do you dislike about <pt>
msgTemplates.endConvReply: Thank you for your valuable feedback. Please visit our website for exciting offers.
msgTemplates.default: Thank you for contacting us, please visit our website for exciting offers.
